hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/629a86a4bf0553e8c61a41d5b1c1c02868c1cc5b)

 We have $9\text{ tens}$ and $8\text{ ones}$.

In all, there are $9\text{ tens}$ and $8\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c370c9f5a2c6a37da2ecdf5452e92f73473d5aec)

$9\text{ tens} + 8\text{ ones}= 98$
